talk.npckname: Red Lotus Palace Entry Report Sign

talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Lotus Palace Entry Report Sign$
By order of Commander Hwaran,
all outsiders must report themselves upon entering our territory.

We welcome all open and honest legal sojourners.

$Red Lotus Palace Entry Report Form$
Give your name to the hamsters!
Name: [ ]

※ Those discovered to have falsely reported information will be imprisoned.

$Red Lotus Palace Entry Report Form$
Entry report complete!
Welcome to the Red Lotus Palace.
Have a nice journey, {user_nick}!

$Red Lotus Palace Adventure Guidebook$
A must-see collection of sites for any first-timer in the Red Lotus Palace: The Big 4!

[A Travel Tip Known Only to Locals]
- Commander Hwaran's residence is open to visitors until the front yard, so be sure to check it out.

$Exile of the Vanquished$
A place of exile home to the banished expatriates sent away from Red Lotus Palace for their crimes.
Once banished, you cannot return unless pardoned by Commander Hwaran,
so take care not to do anything to get sent away.

※ Exile of the Vanquished can be reached by passing through the Streets of Red Lotus Palace.

$Red Lotus Palace Garden$
Commander Hwaran's private garden.
Though open to all tourists,
be sure not to fall prey to the commander's playful pet monsters there.

※ Red Lotus Palace Garden can be reached by passing through the Streets of Red Lotus Palace.

$Blue Raven Territory$
A vast and fertile land given as a prize for victory in the Combat Tournament.
The Blue Clan faction has an ongoing winning streak in the Combat Tournament
and has been occupying the land for several years.

※ Blue Raven Territory can be reached by passing through the Streets of Red Lotus Palace.

$Great Arena$
The most sought-after prize in Red Lotus Palace lies in the Great Arena.
The victor of the Combat Tournament is showered with
an unspeakable amount of gold and treasure, as well as a wide swath of territory.

※ The Great Arena can be reached by passing through the Streets of Red Lotus Palace.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Insist they write down what you said)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Lotus Palace Entry Report Form$
Squeek, squeek…? Squeek…?

(The hamsters stop writing and
look at you with deep suspicion.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Insist they write down what you said)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Lotus Palace Entry Report Form$
Squeek-squeek! Squeeeeek─!!

(The hamsters hurl away their brushes and are about to press the 'No ID' button.)
★Caution★ Those discovered to have falsely reported information will be imprisoned.

$Red Lotus Palace Guard$
Got you, villain─!!!
I'll pretend I didn't see you just this once, but don't toy with me!

※ You will not be sent to prison while in a party.

$Red Lotus Palace Guard$
Got you, villain─!!!
I'll pretend I didn't see you just this once, but don't toy with me!

※ You will not be sent to prison while in Rumble Mode or Ladder Matching.
